data: “What would you say,” asked the widow, tucking her skirts cautiously about her patent leather toes and leaning back luxuriously against the variegated pillows, “if I should tell you that I have found the very girl who would make you a model wife?”

"WHAT would you say," asked the widow, tucking her skirts cautiously about her patent leather toes and leaning back luxuriously against the variegated pillows, "if I should tell you that I have found the very girl who would make you a model wife?"

“WHAT would you say,” asked the widow, tucking her skirts cautiously about her patent leather toes and leaning back luxuriously against the variegated pillows, “if I should tell you that I have found the very girl who would make you a model wife?”
The Widow [To Say Nothing of the Man]
